name: Lola's Fruity Sudoku EASY
description:
Here comes the new and improved Lola’s Fruity Sudoku! This classic game is now specially designed for kids ages 4 to 8. Attractive animated instructions help children get into the game easily and they can quickly learn to play even without knowing what Sudoku is.

How is it possible that the game of Sudoku is playable by 4-year-old children, yet still challenging enough for 8-year-olds? It is in how the game has been designed: Lola’s Fruity Sudoku begins with an easy level for young children playing a 3x3 fruit game with three different types of fruit

The player is guided to help Lola Panda properly sort the fruit, depending on the difficulty level. After a few successes, a well-earned award is given which can be used at the end of the game when the Fruit Shop is ready to open. Like other Lola Panda games, Lola’s Fruity Sudoku has very clear instructions and pleasant voice for guidance.

The renewed game consists of the following key features:
- Animated and spoken instructions which are easy to follow
- An easy 3x3 level with 3 different kinds of fruit
- Possibility to help Lola in her Fruit Shop as an achievement reward

Lola’s Fruity Sudoku provides loads of fun and develops children’s logical thinking!
